about_the_game:
A sci-fi, 4X, real-time strategy game. Build, fight, and explore to survive against an unstoppable alien threat. Carry the fight from one galaxy to the next as you battle back from the brink of extinction, and unlock the secrets of the past to restore your people to the path of galactic super power.

Streamlined 4X

Whether you’re a brand new player, a casual player, or a hardcore player who’s coming back after a six month break, the game is easy to pick up. An emphasis is placed on delivering the right information at the right time so you can easily navigate and understand a vast world at a glance. Making decisions with confidence, while not feeling overwhelmed.

Tactical Real-Time Strategy

A slower pace, with fewer units, and limited micro. Each ship you produce is a flying fortress. With careful thought to the configuration of your ships, the composition of your fleets, and the positioning of units in combat, you can win the day against even the most terrifying odds.

Persistent Faction

Failure is not the end, persistence is everything. Start as the battered, broken remnants of a once great people. Rebuild your faction over many games, and explore to recover what was lost. Customize your faction, choose your play-style, and take on ever greater challenges and reap the rewards on your path to reclaiming your place among the stars.

Features:

Customize your faction:

Create, customize, and progress your faction and favorite units over multiple games - carrying your accomplishments from one galaxy to the next.

Open world:

Explore a massive procedurally generated galaxy, finding valuable salvage and research to tip the odds in your favor and unlock the full potential of your faction.

Base building:

Establish and defend outposts and colonies, configuring them to produce resources, serve strategic needs, conduct research, and produce powerful star ships.

Play your way:

Choose how you play as you fight to survive against an unstoppable alien threat - stay hidden, stay mobile, or take the fight to the enemy.

Real-time tactics:

Though your resources are limited your star ships are forces to be reckoned with, careful consideration to the configuration and positioning of units is the key to victory.

Endless challenge:

When you've run out of options retreat further into the deep dark places of the universe and keep the fight going.
